question.question: Which of the following is a common element of questioning in a patient suspected of having mononucleosis syndrome?
question.option_a: Contact with a cat or consumption of food contaminated by a cat
question.option_b: Recent introduction of new medication or suspicion of an adverse reaction to medication
question.option_c: Notion of risky sexual relations or intravenous drug use
question.option_d: Presence of general signs such as fever and asthenia
